titleStmt.title: Choice ayres, songs, & dialogues to sing to the theorbo-lute, or bass-viol being most of the newest ayres and songs, sung at court, and at the publick theatres / composed by several gentlemen of His Majesties musick, and others, newly reprinted with large additions.
titleStmt.author: Playford, John, 1623-1686?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Godbid, and are sold by John Playford ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
In five parts, each part has separate paging.
